features: Organic Cotton Material: Made from soft, gentle organic cotton that is gentle on baby's skin.
Reusable Design: Cloth wipes can be washed and reused multiple times for convenience.
Whole Body Cleaning: Thirsties wipes are great for cleaning the whole body, including sensitive areas.
Clean Scent: Orange scented wipes leave behind a pleasant aroma.
Trusted Brand: Thirsties is a leading brand in baby essentials with a focus on quality and safety.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #29,399 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #223 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thirsties Organic Cotton Wipes, are a two-sided reusable wipe that are gentle enough to use on your baby’s most delicate areas, yet perfect for handling bigger, sticky messes that can occur during diaper changes. Our 2-ply organic cotton wipes come in a 6-pack with gender-neutral stitching around the edges of the wipe – 2 blue, 2 orange and 2 green. They measure 8 x 8.5 inches and have two, buttery-soft layers of certified organic cotton. These new wipes are perfect for face, hands, bums and bath time.

You want what is best for your child. Yet, you want what’s right for your budget and busy life. And more, what is easier on the environment. As a family owned company, we deeply understand. That’s why we are committed to providing not just exceptional cloth diapers, but products that are better for your child, your family, and our world. Better for your child. Providing the very best diaper for your child’s well-being requires exceptional design, the highest quality fabrics, and sewing with the utmost care and attention. Take, for instance, our signature leg gussets move with your baby to provide a custom fit and advanced protection against leaks — essential for controlling newborn messes and for babies on the move! Better for your family. Your baby will go through an astonishing 6,000 to 9,000 diapers from birth to potty. When purchasing and using Thirsties modern cloth diapers you will save up money while enjoying the same ease-of-use as disposables. And big savings aren’t the only bonus. With Thirsties, there are no late-night trips to the grocery store for more diapers, no emptying your diaper pail into your already full trash bin, no pins and no rubber pants. Thirsties modern cloth diapers go on your baby just as disposables do but with oodles more cuteness and style. Better for our world. We are very proud of the fact that all Thirsties products are manufactured in Colorado, USA, by a group of very talented individuals, many of whom are moms who work in the comfort and convenience of their own homes. We are committed to fair and sustainable labor practices, providing people in our own communities with jobs, and helping local economies. And we do not stop there. More than 90% of the fabrics and materials we use are USA-sourced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for use as napkins or wipes
reviews.reviewText: I cloth diaper, but I actually go these to use as wet wipes for kids after meals etc. they are fantastic and I know they would also be great bum wipes Ad well. They are soft, absorbent, and even cute with their little surged egdes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cloth diapering - soft and absorbent.
reviews.reviewText: Love these. Been cloth diapering since 2 months and bought these to use instead of disposable wipes. They are soft and super absorbent. When my daughter has a BM, it would take 3ish disposable wipes to get clean and it felt like the disposable wipes just smeared it around. With these reusable wipes, we need one... maybe two if it’s a disaster.I use a spray (made from Baby Bits cubes) on then use these wipes to wipe off.If a stain remains after wash, I let them sit outside for a sun bleach. I’ve been using them for about 3 months now and overall, they still look pretty clean.We still have disposables around as a backup and for travel because i haven’t figured that out yet but I hate to use them because of the residue, waste, and chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are great. We have been using for 10 months now and have no quality issues. If you are using cloth diapers you might as well buy wipes too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cloth wipes we have used
reviews.reviewText: These are great with a spray bottle. They soak up moisture fast, are soft, and also a great size. For these because we can't find all of ours from last baby, but these are better than the other two brands we have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2018
reviews.reviewText: These are really great cloth wipes. They are nice and thick. Also, they are soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft for babies sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Super soft and they wash up well. I find these work better then traditional wipes. I never had to use more than one even on large messes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Large, gets the job done. Kinda expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: We love Thirsties! These wipes are so soft and big! One is enough to help clean the dirties butt.
